I was inspired to make this comic after listening to The Wheel and the Ring by Cuz.

About Hannah Sackett

Hannah Sackett is a cartoonist, writer and educator with a background in archaeology. You can read her work here, buy it here or commission it here. Hannah would like to emphasize the non-commercial aspect of the creative commons license under which her work is published on Rounded Bloge.
